charges.charge_description: 18:371, 1956, 2 With others, did knowingly &; wilfully conspire to use &; employ manipulative &; deceptive contrivances &; directly &; indirectly employ devices, schemes &; artifices to defraud; make untrue statements of material facts &; omit to state facts necessary in order to make the statements made, not misleading; &; engage in acts, practices, &; courses of business which would &; did operate as a fraud &; deceit upon members of the investing public, in connection with purchases &; sales of securities, by use of instruments of communication in interstate commerce &; the mails.
